doc:
Mike Berry (singer) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Berry_(singer) 0 Mike Berry (born Michael Hubert Bourne, 24 September 1942) is an English singer and actor. He is known for his top ten hits "Don't You Think It's Time" (1963) and "The Sunshine of Your Smile" (1980) in a singing career spanning nearly 60 years. He subsequently became an actor in the 1970s, best known for his appearances as Mr. Spooner on the British sitcom Are You Being Served? Mike_Berry ( born Michael_Hubert_Bourne , 24_September_1942 ) is an_English_singer_and_actor . He is_known for his_top_ten_hits " Do n't You Think It 's Time_"_(_1963_) and " The_Sunshine of Your_Smile_"_(_1980_) in a_singing_career spanning nearly_60_years . He subsequently became an_actor in the_1970s , best_known for his_appearances as Mr._Spooner on the_British_sitcom Are You Being_Served ?
